projects.name: vjx
projects.description:
Framework for managing Unity scenes through Resolume, a VJ tool.

Unity scenes are segmented into layers and each camera outputs a video stream via NDI.

Scenes appear as source clips in Resolume and are activated by playback, which sends a message to Unity.
